main event: A pilot reported seeing a yellow-green object resembling an elongated light while flying over Madrid, Spain on August 1, 1959.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a baseball but measured approximately 75-90 centimeters long., The sighting lasted for about 1 to 2 minutes and the object had a straight trajectory with no maneuvers., It emitted a pulsating condition for approximately one second without explosion., The observation possessed characteristics typical of a fireball., Two Spanish Air Force crew members, considered reliable, confirmed the sighting.
witness description: Crew members in the Spanish Air Force
